name: FULL POWER
description_a:
You have +3 Range.

You can play three additional Danmaku cards each round.

Discard 1 Powerup card whenever you lose life to an attack.

name: GHOST LANTERN
description_a:
You cannot lose life this turn.
You may play this at any time.

name: GIFT OF YATAGARASU
description_a:
Choose another player. That player draws three cards.
You may play this at any time.
description_b:
Draw two cards.
You may play this at any time.

name: HOURAI ELIXIR
description_a:
When you gain control of this card, gain 1 life.

At the beginning of your turn, gain 1 life.

You cannot go above your max life.

name: INTERRUPT
description_a:
Play this when another player plays
an Action card or activates their Spell Card.

Cancel that card or Spell Card.

name: JEWELED PAGODA
description_a:
You have +1 Range.

Cards you play and Spell Cards you activate cannot be canceled.

When you are hit by a player’s attack, the attacker gains control of Jeweled Pagoda after all Action and Reaction cards in play are resolved.

name: "OFFERING"
description_a:
Play this only when you could play an Action card, or during any player’s discard step.

Choose a player. That player gains control of an Item card in play of your choice. If this would cause that player to exceed a card limit, you choose which card that player keeps.

name: POINT OF COLLECTION
description_a:
Play this when another player plays
an Action, Reaction, or Invocation card.

Put that card into your hand instead
of the discard pile after it is resolved
or canceled. That card cannot be
collected by incidents.

name: REFLECT SHOT
description_a:
Play this when you are attacked.

You avoid the attack.

Attack the attacker, regardless of range.

This does not count against your Danmaku card limit.

name: SCORCHED EARTH
description_a:
Choose a player. You may force that player to discard all Item cards that player controls.

Then, attack that player if they are in range.

By default you can only play one Danmaku card per round.

name: SEVEN STAR SWORD
description_a:
Draw an extra card from the Lunatic deck during your draw step.

If you lose control of Seven Star Sword, draw a card from the Lunatic deck.

name: SPIRIT CAMERA
description_a:
You may discard a Danmaku
card from your hand to cancel a Danmaku card targeting you.

Once per turn, when you hit another player with an attack, you may draw a card.

name: TANUKI LEAF
description_a:
When you gain control of this card, recruit an Extra Character.
When you lose control of this card, dismiss that Extra Character.

You gain the Ability and can activate the Spell Card of that Extra Character.

name: UCHIDE'S MALLET
description_a:
When you gain control of this card, recruit an Extra Character.
When you lose control of this card, dismiss that Extra Character.

You gain the Ability and can activate the Spell Card of that Extra Character.
